Events that occurred on 28 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 14.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Kenneth Sisam.
1964 - Tree and Leaf is first published in the UK.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes to an unknown reader.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Anthony D. Howlett.
1976 - Actor Liam O'Brien is born.
1980 - Second edition of The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth is published.
2010 - Scholar Alexei Kondratiev dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events on this day.
